name: Discord Web Compact
description: Compact version of Discord web that involves reorganizing the UI and compressing non-chat elements, especially when in use.
additional_info:
Please note that this theme is not 100% accessible for disabled folk as it relies on hover stylizations only. It may also be incompatible with/override parts of another theme you have enabled.
